website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking blocks of chalk with no-moisture, no-slip guarantees should check out this product from Chalk Ness Monster.
pros: Made of premium magnesium carbonate chalk for supreme absorbing sweat and moisture
cons: Some had issues with the refillable bag breaking very soon after purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Grab thunder
customer_reviews.text: As i was chalking up i could feel the power of Chalkness Monster coursing through my veins. I looked at my barbell and said, "it's about to go down." When i grabbed hold of that sucker i heard it wince it pain. I was slinging plates like they were weightless. After 30min my barbell cried, "bro, can we take a break? this sh*+ hurts!" And I was like, "shut up barbell!" Needless to say, I left that barbell sobbing like a baby when i was finally done. True story.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRASH.
customer_reviews.text: I have an asmr page and used to buy your gymchalk religiously because my followers really loved when I crumbled your chalk. “Your welcome for you increase of sales”. I’ve tried to even reach out to you guys to buy this product directly from you. (No response) It’s obvious since the holidays you guys switch your product up their isn’t any crunch to this gymchalk at all.. it breaks apart instantly. Never recommending this gymchalk again!
customer_reviews.author: Omgg_asmr

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly cakes
customer_reviews.text: Agreed with Mikael Dillon Sink, this chalk does not function as it needs to. Ours arrived in fine condition but once we opened it, the chalk just crumbles but not enough into a powder that you would expect chalk to do. Trying to rub it on hands is almost impossible since it's like rubbing rocks on your hands. What's interesting is that we used this brand a year ago and it was fine. Seems like something changed in their process or it just went "bad" if that's possible.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: from Mike H. on June 17, 2018 This stuff is garbage it doesn't transfer to your hand at all I thought chalk was chalk I WAS WRONG, I was almost out of my last chalk block so I bought this product. This stuff is garbage it doesn't transfer to your hand at all... it just crumbles and makes a mess on the floor. and now I'm stuck with 8 blocks of chalk that I can't even use. DO NOT BUY THIS ,WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a crossfit gym in my garage in south Florida. Safe to say it gets hot even at 6am. This chalk is pretty inexpensive and worked great this morning while I did a workout that combined a bar movement and running. This is perfect if your are doing a work out where using gloves or straps doesn't work or if you are working on grip strength. Crossfit is all about grip strength so this is perfect in place of the straps I normally use on heavier bar lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So first off this is a solid chalk for a non competing person just looking for some chalk to help them out in the gym. Obviously you're not getting top of the line stuff at these prices, that said for the price it's not a bad buy at all. But a word of caution if you are going to be using this for grip work such as the ironmind hub and rolling thunder wet your hand and dry it mostly before plunging your hand into the chalk. Crushing it to a powder before using and storing in a bucket works much better transfering to the hand than rubbing the block on your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Race Darga

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality chalk made in China. Does not stick to hands well and bricks fall apart easily. Waste of money, look for better chalk.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Dengler

customer_reviews.title: Chalk is fine, blocks break too easily though
customer_reviews.text: The chalk is fine. It's not my favorite chalk, but it's chalk, and has general chalkish qualities. The problem is that the blocks are crumbly. If I buy a block, I want a block, not a crumbly mess. This stuff is super lightweight and breaks extremely easily. I would resort to taking some of the small chunks and just crushing them between my hands. I have since switched to another brand that has blocks that don't shatter so easily. Like I said, it's chalk, and it's fine, but it's not good as far as bar chalk goes. I still keep this chalk in a big ziplock, crushed up. Gave some of it away with craigslist gym equipment sales.
customer_reviews.author: unix_geek

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for climbing and it works great. Looking at the other reviews, im guessing this is primarily meant for the gym, which is why there are some unhappy customers. But for climbing, you have to crush it into powder anyways when you transfer it into your bag. So yeah, if you're looking for a solid block, this is not gonna be it...but if you need powder or something that breaks apart easily, this is for you. I like it. Been buying for awhile now.
customer_reviews.author: Willy M. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Should have read the reviews first
customer_reviews.text: I have a garage gym and we go through quite a bit of chalk. I’ve bought chalk on amazon before and was very happy, but not this brand or from this buyer. After I received it and opened it, I noticed that it was hard and crumbly. It doesn’t stick to your hands well and isn’t smooth or grippy like chalk is supposed to be. After reading some reviews now, I wish I had read them earlier because this is a common complaint. Do yourself a favor and save your money and buy from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: BDHLR

customer_reviews.title: If you want cracked and crumbly mess, here you go!
customer_reviews.text: This was hard, almost claylike, full of hairline cracks so when you handled it, even lightly, it fell apart. It didn’t have a powdery quality. I’ve never used this brand and never will again.
customer_reviews.author: AmyA

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality chalk. Doesn't have that powdery substance ...
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality chalk. Doesn't have that powdery substance that a normal chalk would have. Most of it came off of my hand when trying to apply it. Avoid and spend a little more on higher quality chalk. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down way too easy.
customer_reviews.text: Not good, every piece was broken in the wrapping. Won’t stay in a block to use for lifting, crumbles as soon as it hits the bucket. If I wanted chalk in powder form, I’d buy it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Doss

customer_reviews.title: Not very good gym chalk..
customer_reviews.text: this stuff breaks and crumbles up more than it applies a layer of chalk.. It seems more like sidewalk chalk consistency than it does something we use in the gym. we bought it as an alternative to the more expensive chalk we've used in the past, unfortunately we threw away half a box, its just that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Odubhlaoich

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I haven't bought a lot of chalk in the past, but I am nothing but pleased with this. I use it when lifting, climbing, and doing various parkour, calisthenics, and ninja-style training and competition. I use it almost daily and it seems like I haven't even made a dent in the pound after approx. 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCooey

customer_reviews.title: Satan's dandruff
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know there was such a thing as bad chalk until I purchased this item. Powder does not come off the block onto your hand directly at all and the blocks are overly compressed making them very fragile and messy. Furthermore, even when ground down into powder, it remains far more coarse than other brands of chalk I have used before in the past. I bought a pound of this product and after frustratingly dealing with two blocks, I've finally caved and bought a new pound from a better distributor and threw the 6 remaining blocks of this garbage away.
customer_reviews.author: Vincanni

customer_reviews.title: Skip a step and just buy powdered chalk
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the wrapper the entire block broke into about 5 pieces. Trying to use the larger broken shards just shattered them further into not usable pieces. The chalk that did stick to my hands was mostly ineffectual. Terrible value.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Does not coat like Rogue Chalk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on the reviews saying it was a good product. With having Rogue Chalk prior there is such a difference in the coating of your hands. The Chalkness Monster hardly coats your hands while the Rogue Chalk provides a really nice coating. I wish I would have spent the extra dollar and bought Rogue Chalk and not wasted my money on this one. It also breaks very easy. Very unhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest Option
customer_reviews.text: All chalk meant for grip support is made up of magnesium carbonate, so all non-liquid chalk is basically the same thing. This stuff works very well. You should not expect the chalk to be a picture perfect block every time. That is super unrealistic. You should break the blocks into a bucket anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: ASMR
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully Everything arrived in tact. I use this chalk for ASMR purposes so I can only review from that stand point. It crumbles very quickly and the texture is very fine. In comparison to other chalks; the texture seems to be very flour like instead of chalk like. Anyways; for dither details ; I did a quick review of the chalk on my page Instagram page @sippi_asmr.
customer_reviews.author: Highly_Favored

customer_reviews.title: Block crumbles easily,  too fragile for me.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think chalk could suck. I don’t prefer this type of chalk. I don’t like how the block crumbles so easily, and as I apply it to my hands it doesn’t adhere very well. I’m constantly having to reapply more often with this brand than I would have with my usual brand. I only bought this brand because of the graphic of the Loch Ness Monster.
customer_reviews.author: ryeseeder

customer_reviews.title: It's not a "block" of chalk
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I purchased this product was to have a block of chalk. In the past I have purchased powder form of chalk and it is very messy. This product comes in the shape of a block but when opened, it crumbles to pieces. Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A Great Chalk for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This chalk is best used by breaking down the blocks in to smaller pieces and crushing them or simply turning it into a powder to spread. If you like applying chalk directly from the block this brand may not be suitable for your desires. Absorbs moisture very efficiently so make sure to apply chalk beyond the bounds of the desired area.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value here, glad they were individually packaged. Brand was entertaining so I gave it a try and was not disappointed, hard to find chalk in a store without having to pay a bunch for just one brick. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mueller

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: This was awful. The entire box was busted and there was chalk everywhere. Returned it, for another one and it was in the exact same condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. We bought for our Crossfit box and was not able to use. It was almost like it had gotten wet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ward

customer_reviews.title: 1000% worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the awesome name. It's hilarious. The chalk performed perfectly. I was able to increase weight on my lifts because my grip was secure and I was able to concentrate 100% on getting jacked.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Brittle and didn't apply well.
customer_reviews.text: The quantity is good for the price, but the shipment I received was very brittle. On my first application to my hands an entire square snapped in half and continued to break as I applied it. There is more chalk on the floor (chunks) than my hands. Mine was brittle enough that it worked great once I crushed it into a refillable chalk bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this due to the name and adorable lochness monster logo
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I bought this due to the name and adorable lochness monster logo. The chalk sort of sucks though, it's crumbly and doesn't adhere as well as the chalk I got from Pendlay a few years back. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: doppz

customer_reviews.title: Poorly shipped...
customer_reviews.text: There was chalk all over everything that I bought. Also, there was chalk coming out of the box! Not happy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I know some people have an issue with it coming in broken but none of mine were. I use it for an unconventional use so I loved it. Super soft and crunchy!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty average
customer_reviews.text: I am a rock climber that uses a lot of chuck so I decided to use a cheap chuck to see whether it is worth swapping but it clearly isnt. This chulk is horrible! Like it barely improves the slipping problem of your hands when you are climbing and I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Athanasios Kougionis

customer_reviews.title: then it's a terrible product since it crumbles too easily
customer_reviews.text: Depends on how you use it. If you try to keep it as a block, then it's a terrible product since it crumbles too easily. If you crumble it and use it as powder, it's an okay product. It does its job, but it sticks too easily so you over-chalk pretty often.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great for Climbing
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this item. Great for both outdoor and indoor rock climbing. Needs a little breaking up before it is a fine powder but definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Decent chalk in block form
customer_reviews.text: Chalk is good. Not as course as the rogue chalk on application. Because of this, it last longer in block form. However, packaging is not secure and my last shipment had all broken chalk blocks. Not ideal for using application.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Total Scam!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a total scam! It said that it was 1lb for 10 dollars. We received a 2.2 ounce block. One single block. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Schuldt

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: Came broken in package and is extremely fragile chalk. I would prefer if it stayed hard enough to be a block instead of crumbs. But it works once you get it on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a dozen and I received one and it was broken to pieces and completely useless.
customer_reviews.text: This order took over a month to arrive. I ordered a dozen and I received one and it was broken to pieces and completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: The chalk is as good as the user
customer_reviews.text: I own a CrossFit gym and have purchased all kinds of chalk. As far as I can tell, they are all the same and work great as long as the athletes know how to use it. Search "chalk this one up YouTube" to see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: aRegularGuy

customer_reviews.title: Total misrepresentation of product. Description states 1lb, which ...
customer_reviews.text: Total misrepresentation of product. Description states 1lb, which should be eight small blocks. I ordered two which should have been sixteen blocks. All I got was two small blocks and not the two packages of eight small blocks.
customer_reviews.author: East Side Athletic Club

customer_reviews.title: SLIPPERY AS..,
customer_reviews.text: IF YOUR LOOKING FOR TALC POWDER, THIS IS IT. I NEED SOME FRICTION, WHEN THINGS ARE HOT AND SWEATY, OR COLD AND RESISTANT. THIS IS THE SLIPPERIEST "POWER" EVER!! I SHOULD HAVE USED BABY POWDER! MAYBE I COULD HAVE HELD ON TO THE BAR!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: You have to add a lot and it has a cheap pool chalk texture vs a good thick gym chalk texture I was hopeing for
customer_reviews.text: Ok chalk for powerlifting. You have to add a lot and it has a cheap pool chalk texture vs a good thick gym chalk texture I was hopeing for. It’ll do the job it just takes a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Willah1371

customer_reviews.title: Only Chalk I will use
customer_reviews.text: Good price , quality product , has a flexing mythical creature on its cover .... all boxes checked .
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Alright for cheap chalk
customer_reviews.text: Not the best chalk, packaging isn’t going to stop it getting messed up by swings in humidity. Only up side is the price/block
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff, But Packagaging Leaking Or Just Not Clean
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, but packaging was leaking a bit and needed some cleaning but apart from that works as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite climbing chalk
customer_reviews.text: More dusty than chalky when it crumbles. Likewise the blocks crumble into hard edges and doesn't soften like Frank Endo chalk. Does the job but I'm not a fan. This is more of a note to myself to not reorder this particular brand of chalk, and stick with what I know. Frank Endo fa life!
customer_reviews.author: Smith A. M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but BSN is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I like this chalk but it’s always broken and sometimes crushed to pieces. I do like the quality but it’s almost the same as BSN. BSN is also broken sometimes but not as bad as this product. I’d prefer to just order BSN because it’s much cheaper and I get more full unbroken blocks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use the chalk!
customer_reviews.text: This chalk works perfectly as intended. Sad to say after several years of lifting i've never used chalk before and now i have no idea why i haven't used it all this time! first block i took out of the box was perfectly in tact so i just smoothly and easily apply it onto the palms and fingers and bamm. no more worrying about those sweaty mitts slipping when your'e doing deadlifts, pullups. etc. grip restored and increased.
customer_reviews.author: David Silva

customer_reviews.title: good chalk at a good price, cartoon monster looks shredded
customer_reviews.text: First off the carton chalk ness monster is hilarious. Moving on, I think this is pretty good gym chalk. I'm an avid cross fitter and olympic lifter. Stuff works pretty good for me. Some of the blocks break apart easier than I would like but I don't mind that much, I just have to make sure I'm not man handling the stuff. It's cheap and you get a decent amount, good in my book
customer_reviews.author: Selena S

customer_reviews.title: User approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren who I take rock climbing. It appears to do everything it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dann

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Its ok chalk. I use for climbing and there are definitely better gym chalks out there.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: its great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my workouts- its great. Still use it
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Pick some up
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk for lifting! You get a ton of chalk for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jessie mitchell

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Every single block received was broken and crumbled. This happened on the past 2 orders and thought I would give them one last chance, but the last 3 orders now, I’ve been completely dissatisfied with. I know chalk breaks down anyways but to have every single block completely broken apart is sending me elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse than useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple times in the past. Worked great, and good price. Used some today from a very recent order, for indoor rock climbing, and it sucks, it literally made my hands smooth and slippery! Rubbish. Dunno what happened, but I'm sure the manufacturers do, yet they'e still pushing this rubbish. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy broken chalk
customer_reviews.text: Every single piece was broken left chalk mess everywhere before it was even opened . Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chalk for ASMR
customer_reviews.text: Used for ASMR purposes and I loved the way it crumbled 🙋🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Cor77

customer_reviews.title: Worse chalk I have used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, the worse chalk I have used in 22 years of lifting. It want from block form, to breaking, to almost nothing on your hands. It clumped up between your fingers when sweaty. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works well, makes lifting weights with sweaty/ clammy hands much safer
customer_reviews.author: Silem

customer_reviews.title: It is a really good crunch
customer_reviews.text: I liked the texture of the chalk but not that it comes broken every order.
customer_reviews.author: Gina De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Every single square of chalk was busted in pieces. Not a single block was whole. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Putman

customer_reviews.title: Gym chalk
customer_reviews.text: The best gym chalk ever! I am happy to purchase this gym chalk. It’s soft and easy to crumble.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: All around solid
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the value - not the best chalk I have used. Definitely better than average. Id buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ron Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Not for gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: I own a gymnastics school. Decided to try this brand just because it was a little better price. I try different brands every once in awhile and the kids never even notice the difference. EVERY gymnast complained of the texture difference and that it felt slippery for this one..
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse Sports Center LLC

customer_reviews.title: Just chalk, does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Just chalk not much else to it, i got the full package for a pretty good deal so i am happy. Can't really complain about anything people it's just chalk for some lifting.
customer_reviews.author: dawid

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and awesome name!
customer_reviews.text: Supplied to a commercial Crossfit gym works like a charm and breaks up easily, which I prefer. Power holds well and is not chunky. Cleans off bars easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Buy this. This stuff will probably last me a year if not waaaaaaaaaaay longer.
customer_reviews.author: alexuria

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Literally crumbles without actually getting any chalk on your hand, got this one bc my other one isnt sold anymore and was severely disappointed. have a whole package that im not going to use now because its basically impossible
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Chalk was very soft compound and doesn't stay in balls or blocks. Its fine if you are okay dealing with powder.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It came a bit messy due to being chalk but it is amazing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and we love the name
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my dad. He loves it and we love the name. High quality. Helps with grip during bench and squats.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Gym chalk
customer_reviews.text: Blocks were all crumbled and broken and not intact. Made a huge mess!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara cosme

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for good chalk that stick this ain't it
customer_reviews.text: This chalk is to soft , does not stuck as well feels like straight up powder . The block it come in dissolves so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jsally

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Chalkiness Monster Brand
customer_reviews.text: I am the owner of a private gymnastics club located in the hot and humid midwest. I bought a couple different brands for my gymnastics program. This is the only brand of chalk my Optional-level athletes requested when we were getting low. They get more turns per chalk-up keeping them out of the chalk bin and me from losing my sanity. Highly recommend Chalkiness Monster Brand.
customer_reviews.author: AGI Coach

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use these for weightlifting. A little bit goes a long way. I use it a few times a week and I'm still on the same block after about 6 months. Chalk doesn't really dry my hands out either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, Hard, Does not rub well
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use our at CrossFit gym, the chalk is very hard and low quality. Does not rub onto hands or thighs easily or at all. Would not recommend for anyone to purchase this chalk. Very disappointment with the quality of the chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Kuan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best chaulk I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Lasts forever! Just put it in a bucket to keep it contained. Absolutely the best chaulk I've ever used. Not to mention every one else uses it at the gym because we replaced our old chaulk with this brand!!! Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son's powerlifting gym. The owner is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Crumbles easily and not good.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst chalk ever. It crumbles does not stick to you or offer at good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Chalk with a Funny Name
customer_reviews.text: It's chalk. It keeps your hands dry for dead lifts, shrugs, etc. You get a good amount too. It should last me years.
customer_reviews.author: PA Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1 x 2oz block of chalk with my order
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 x 2oz block of chalk with my order... Would appreciate getting the other 7 as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ryan s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this years ago and still using it. Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yang

customer_reviews.title: Chalk doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I've previously made a purchase a few months back and the chalk worked just fine, however, my recent purchase was the opposite. The chalk wouldn't stick to my hands properly, felt as tho this made my grip worse for climbing :(
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: ASMR user
customer_reviews.text: I use this for ASMR, and it’s not soft at all. Extremely crunchy, so if that is what you like, Chalkness is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: this is the third time purchasing. That says it all
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: cost to quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Not the finest chalk ive ever used, but effective none the less. its a bit grainy, doesnt absorb quite as much moisture, but adequate for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Decent chalk
customer_reviews.text: Chalk is slightly brittle but definitely gets the job done. Even though it breaks pretty easily, the chalk does stay on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: L. Yearby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It made everyone in the gym hate me, especially the people who worked there
customer_reviews.author: Very Good Reviews brought to you by yours truly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great gym chalk came a little broken up but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Henley

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: We use this chalk in our weight room. It does what it is supposed to do, dry your hands when you are sweaty. Makes gripping much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: it tends to perform better than the cheap chalk they hand out at the ...
customer_reviews.text: this product works as advertised for the cost. it tends to perform better than the cheap chalk they hand out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: krusty

customer_reviews.title: Low grade
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packaged and mostly broken upon receipt. The chalk hasn’t held its form well and crumbles upon handling.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our powerlifting gym members and this stuff is terrible. Barely sticks to your hands and does nothing to help. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: AjaOsborne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to crush!! 🤤
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this chalk is. I use it for my asmr videos. But all of them came broken. I wish I can buy one that comes whole. IG @crunchmunchie.asmr
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Santana

customer_reviews.title: Easy buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price! And does it's job. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: erik azpeitia

customer_reviews.title: Its Guuuuud!
customer_reviews.text: I like this chalk. I use it for powerlifting and keep it in a tubberware for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Luke

customer_reviews.title: Crappy
customer_reviews.text: Crappy crappy crappy! Doesn’t rub onto your hands at all, dry and brittle possibly old who knows but it sucks. Ended up throwing entire order away.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Chalk cracks and crumbles. Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This chalk crumbles and does not stick to your hands. I have been through half the blocks in the package and all have crumbled. I do not recommend this chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: All the bars broken
customer_reviews.text: Every single bar came crushed, if I wanted chalk powder I would’ve ordered chalk powder.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but is not a good product
customer_reviews.text: wanted to save a few dollars and purchased this chalk but the quality isn't great the other gym chalk they sell on amazon are much better and only 2 or so dollars more. won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bunz

product_meta.title: Gym Chalk (1 lb, 8 2oz Blocks) - Gymnastics, Rock Climbing, Power Lifting, Crossfit No Slip, No Moisture Chalk (1 LB)
product_meta.description:
Gym Chalk - Climbing, Weightlifting, Gymnastics - No Slip, No Moisture Chalk 

Chalk Ness Monster chalk is premium 100% magnesium carbonate chalk to give you a superior grip at a fraction of the price of the competitors. Chalk Ness Monster is good for all competitors - no discrimination here. This could be power lifting chalk, gymnastics chalk, rock climbing chalk, kettleball training or Crossfit chalk, as long as you are trying to bring the best out of yourself, this chalk is for you (and if you're just going for a casual workout, hey that's fine too). This gym chalk can ensure your hands stay dry and your grip doesn't slip. When competing, the last thing on your mind should be whether your grip will slip out from under you. The focus should be on the contest, on the preparation that got you to this moment, and the job that lies ahead of you. Put worry and sweat out of your mind with Chalk Ness Monster. Whether you are... 
-Hanging from a rock outcrop and contemplating your path to the peak 
-Psyching yourself up for the heaviest deadlift you've attempted 
-Sprinting towards the vault for a Yurchenko 3/2 
-In a Kettlebell or Crossfit workout session pushing yourself farther than you've gone yet 

...Chalk Ness Monster will get your back. No slip, all grip.
feature_bullets: 100% MAGNESIUM CARBONATE PREMIUM CHALK For Absorbing Moisture And Improving Grip
ONE POUND OF QUALITY GYM CHALK In 8 2oz Blocks
MASTER YOUR GAME: Use For Power Lifting, Gymnastics Chalk, Rock Climbing Chalk, Kettlebell, Or Crossfit Chalk
BEST MONSTER ON THE MARKET: Chalk Ness Monster Gives You A Powerful No Slip Grip
WE GOT YOUR BACK: Chalk Might Crumble, But Powered Form Does Not Affect Its Usability
